gbdx_tools package¶

Submodules¶

gbdx_tools.gbdx_interface module¶

author: Kostas Stamatiou

contact: kostas.stamatiou@digitalglobe.com

This module contains functions to interface with GBDX. For information on the GBDX API go to http://gbdxdocs.digitalglobe.com/.

gbdx_tools.gbdx_interface.check_order_status(sales_order_number, access_token)¶

Checks imagery order status.

Parameters:
  • sales_order_number (str) – Sales order number.
  • access_token (str) – GBDX access token.
Returns:

‘done’ if imagery has been ordered; ‘processing’ if not (str).
gbdx_tools.gbdx_interface.check_workflow_status(workflow_id, access_token)¶

Checks workflow status.

Parameters:
  • workflow_id (str) – Workflow id.
  • access_token (str) – GBDX access token.
Returns:

Workflow status (str).
gbdx_tools.gbdx_interface.delete_in_s3(s3_bucket, s3_directory, access_token)¶

Delete all files within s3_bucket/s3_directory.

Parameters:
  • s3_bucket (str) – User S3 bucket.
  • s3_directory (str) – S3 directory within bucket. It should not be preceded with nor followed by a backslash.
  • access_token (str) – GBDX access token.
gbdx_tools.gbdx_interface.download_from_s3(s3_bucket, s3_directory, local_directory, access_token)¶

Download files from s3_bucket/s3_directory.

Parameters:
  • s3_bucket (str) – User S3 bucket.
  • s3_directory (str) – S3 directory within bucket. It should not be preceded with nor followed by a backslash.
  • local_directory (str) – Local directory where files will be stored.
  • access_token (str) – GBDX access token.
gbdx_tools.gbdx_interface.get_access_token(username, password, api_key)¶
Returns a GBDX access token from user GBDX credentials.
The access token is good for 7 days.
Parameters:
  • username (str) – GBDX user name.
  • password (str) – GBDX password.
  • api_key (str) – GBDX API key.
Returns:

GBDX access token (str)
gbdx_tools.gbdx_interface.get_catalog_ids(job)¶

Returns a list of image catalog ids specified in job.

Parameters:job (dict) – A dictionary corresponding to job.json. For the structure of job.json look in README of this repo.
Returns:List of image catalog ids (list).
gbdx_tools.gbdx_interface.get_location_of_ordered_imagery(sales_order_number, access_token)¶

Find location of ordered imagery.

Parameters:
  • sales_order_number (str) – Sales order number.
  • access_token (str) – GBDX access token.
Returns:

Imagery location in S3 (str).
gbdx_tools.gbdx_interface.has_this_been_ordered(image_catalog_id, access_token)¶

Checks if image has been ordered.

Parameters:
  • image_catalog_id (str) – Image Catalog id in DG factory.
  • access_token (str) – GBDX access token.
Returns:

‘True’ if image has been ordered; ‘False’ if not (str).
gbdx_tools.gbdx_interface.launch_workflow(workflow, access_token)¶

Launches GBDX workflow.

Parameters:
  • workflow (dict) – Dictionary specifying workflow tasks.
  • access_token (str) – GBDX access token.
Returns:

Workflow id (str).
gbdx_tools.gbdx_interface.order_imagery(image_catalog_ids, access_token)¶

Orders images from GBDX.

Parameters:
  • image_catalog_ids (list) – A list of image catalog ids.
  • access_token (str) – GBDX access token string.
Returns:

sales order number (str).
gbdx_tools.gbdx_interface.read_json(json_file)¶

Creates a dictionary from a json file.

Parameters:json_file (str) – A filename ending in .json.
Returns:Dictionary corresponding to json_file (dict)
gbdx_tools.gbdx_interface.set_params_aop_to_s3_workflow(aop_to_s3, input_images_location, output_images_location)¶

Set parameters for aop_to_s3 workflow.

Parameters:
  • aop_to_s3 (dict) – Workflow dictionary.
  • input_images_location (str) – Imagery location on S3.
  • output_images_location (str) – Output imagery location on S3.
